 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָכַשׁ‎</span> **verb** ==collect, gather property==, verb only P (rare) (Mandean <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎דכש‎</span> ***gather***, [[BDB#Norberg|Norberg]]<sup>Lexid.231</sup>; Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***rukûšu***</u></abbr>, ***property*** ([[BDB#Hpt|Hpt]]<sup>Hebraica iii. 110</sup> ***riding animal***); Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎רִכְשָׁא‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> = Biblical Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֶכֶשׁ‎</span>); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ר‎</span>, accusative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קִנְיָן‎</span>, [[Gen.31.18|Gen 31:18]]b [[Gen.36.6|Gen 36:6]] else where with accusative of congnate meaning with verb <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רְכוּשׁ‎</span>: <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אָשֶׁר רָכָ֑שׁ‎</span> [[Gen.31.18|Gen 31:18]]a, 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָֽכְשׁוּ‎</span> [[Gen.46.6|Gen 46:6]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎דָכָ֑שׁוּ‎</span> [[Gen.12.5|Gen 12:5]].
